mapper.sql: f_b_id, user_id, fish_id, bubble_title, provenance, fish_height, fish_price, fish_quantity, discounts, send_out_condition, no_shipments_scope, creation_date, is_show_bubble, show_date, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert: insert into fish_bubble (f_b_id, user_id, fish_id, bubble_title, provenance, fish_height, fish_price, fish_quantity, discounts, send_out_condition, no_shipments_scope, creation_date, is_show_bubble, show_date, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{fBId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fishId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bubbleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provenance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fishHeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fishPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fishQuantity,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{discounts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendOutCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noShipmentsScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isShowBubble,jdbcType=BIT}, #{showDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update fish_bubble
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fish_id = #{fishId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
bubble_title = #{bubbleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
provenance = #{provenance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fish_height = #{fishHeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fish_price = #{fishPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fish_quantity = #{fishQuantity,jdbcType=CHAR},
discounts = #{discounts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_out_condition = #{sendOutCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
no_shipments_scope = #{noShipmentsScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_show_bubble = #{isShowBubble,jdbcType=BIT},
show_date = #{showDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where f_b_id = #{fBId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update fish_bubble set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fish_id = #{fishId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bubble_title = #{bubbleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provenance = #{provenance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fish_height = #{fishHeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fish_price = #{fishPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fish_quantity = #{fishQuantity,jdbcType=CHAR}, discounts = #{discounts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_out_condition = #{sendOutCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, no_shipments_scope = #{noShipmentsScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_show_bubble = #{isShowBubble,jdbcType=BIT}, show_date = #{showDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where f_b_id = #{fBId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT c.qq_name qqName, c.qq qq, b.scientific_name scientificName, b.fish_name fishName, a.provenance provenance, a.fish_height fishHeight, a.fish_price fishPrice, if(a.fish_quantity = 0, '一对', '一条') fishQuantity, ifnull(a.discounts, '无') discounts, ifnull(a.send_out_condition, '无') sendOutCondition, ifnull(a.no_shipments_scope, '无') noShipmentsScope FROM fish_bubble a LEFT JOIN fish_lib b ON a.fish_id = b.fish_id LEFT JOIN user c ON a.user_id = c.user_id WHERE is_show_bubble = 1 ORDER BY a.creation_date DESC

SELECT a.f_b_id fBId, c.user_id userId, b.fish_id fishId, c.qq_name qqName, c.qq qq, b.scientific_name scientificName, b.fish_name fishName, a.provenance provenance, a.fish_height fishHeight, a.fish_price fishPrice, a.fish_quantity fishQuantity, a.discounts discounts, a.send_out_condition sendOutCondition, a.no_shipments_scope noShipmentsScope FROM fish_bubble a LEFT JOIN fish_lib b ON a.fish_id = b.fish_id LEFT JOIN user c ON a.user_id = c.user_id WHERE is_show_bubble = 1 ORDER BY a.creation_date DESC
